mapper.select: select uid,nickname,tenant_id as tenantId,school_id as schoolId,`name`,`account` from student where account=#{account} and password=#{password}
select uid,image,link,sort from banner where tenant_Id=#{tenant_id} and type=#{type}

select s.head, s.name, pe.uid, pe.comments_time, cp.pkg_name, pe.comments_star, pe.comments_content from period_evaluation pe inner join student s on s.uid=pe.student_id inner join course_pkg cp on pe.course_id=cp.uid where pe.course_id=#{uid} and s.tenant_id=#{tenant_id} and cp.status="1"

select s.head, s.name, pe.uid, pe.comments_time, cp.pkg_name, pe.comments_star, pe.comments_content from period_evaluation pe inner join student s on s.uid=pe.student_id inner join course_pkg cp on pe.course_id=cp.uid where pe.course_id=#{uid} and s.tenant_id=#{tenant_id} and cp.status="1" and pe.comments_star >4

select s.head, s.name, pe.uid, pe.comments_time, cp.pkg_name, pe.comments_star, pe.comments_content from period_evaluation pe inner join student s on s.uid=pe.student_id inner join course_pkg cp on pe.course_id=cp.uid where pe.course_id=#{uid} and s.tenant_id=#{tenant_id} and cp.status="1" and pe.comments_star <=4 and pe.comments_star >=2

select s.head, s.name, pe.uid, pe.comments_time, cp.pkg_name, pe.comments_star, pe.comments_content from period_evaluation pe inner join student s on s.uid=pe.student_id inner join course_pkg cp on pe.course_id=cp.uid where pe.course_id=#{uid} and s.tenant_id=#{tenant_id} and cp.status="1" and pe.comments_star <2

select pe.uid, pe.comments_time, pe.comments_star, pe.comments_content, s.name, s.head, cp.pkg_name from period_evaluation pe inner join course_pkg cp on pe.course_id=cp.uid inner join student s on pe.student_id=s.uid where cp.teacher_id=#{uid} and cp.tenant_id=#{tenant_id} and cp.status="1"

SELECT s.uid as uid , s.head as head, s.sex as sex, s.`name` as `name`, s.nickname as nickname, sc.school_name as school_name, s.clazz as clazz, p.`name` as grade_name, s.age as age, s.integral, g.uid as gid, g.`call` as `call`, g.phone as phone FROM student s inner JOIN school sc ON s.school_id = sc.uid inner JOIN guardian g ON s.uid = g.student_id inner JOIN pkg_grade p ON s.grade_id = p.uid WHERE s.uid = #{uid} AND s.tenant_id =#{tenant_id}
mapper.update: update collect set is_collect=2 where uid=#{uid} and student_id=#{student_id} and tenant_id=#{tenant_id}
mapper.select: select type from answer where uid=#{answer_id}
select balance from student where uid=#{student_id}
select is_exceptional from answer where uid=#{answer_id}
mapper.update: update student set balance=balance-#{value} where uid=#{student_id}
update teacher set balance=balance+#{value} where uid=#{teacher_id}
mapper.insert: insert into integrallist(uid,name,value,type,student_id,teacher_id) value(#{uid},"学生积分打赏",#{value},2)
mapper.select: SELECT s.head AS head, s.uid AS uid, s.integral AS integral, s.`name` AS NAME, s.sex AS sex, s.nickname AS nickname, sl.school_name AS school_name, g.phone AS phone, pg.`name` AS grade_name FROM student s inner JOIN school sl ON s.school_id = sl.uid inner JOIN guardian g ON s.uid = g.student_id inner JOIN pkg_grade pg ON s.grade_id = pg.uid WHERE g.type = 1 AND s.uid = #{uid} and s.tenant_id=#{tenant_id}
mapper.update: update student set head=#{head} where uid=#{uid} and tenant_id=#{tenant_id}
update student set nickname=#{nickname} where uid=#{uid} and tenant_id=#{tenant_id}
update student set password=#{password} where uid=#{uid} and tenant_id=#{tenant_id}
mapper.select: SELECT g.`call` AS `call`, g.uid AS uid, g.phone AS phone, g.type AS type FROM student s inner JOIN guardian g ON s.uid = g.student_id
